dao.name: QRY_SHIP_DT_ROUND_NOS
dao.statement: select pg_ais.sf_get_comp_sval(:comp_cod, 'SH', 'ship_dt_round_nos') as ship_dt_round_nos from dual

dao.statement: select pg_ais.sf_get_comp_sval(:comp_cod, 'SH', 'ship_mn_round_nos') as ship_mn_round_nos from dual

dao.name: QRY_REQUIRED_BRIDE_NAM

dao.name: QRY_DEFAULT_USE_TYP_COMMON

dao.name: QRY_DEFAULT_BQUET_ORDER_STA
dao.statement: select pg_ais.sf_get_comp_sval('NULL', 'BQ', 'default_bquet_order_sta') as default_bquet_order_sta from dual

dao.name: QRY_DEFAULT_EXPIRE_DAT

dao.name: QRY_DEFAULT_POADULT_QNT
